entry.title: oh, my life is changing everyday, in every possibly way
entry.summary:
Author: softegirl

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,113Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: if you asked anyone who knew buck and eddie, they would say the two men were extremely codependent on each other.it’s okay, don't get them wrong; but when that misplaced codependency is purely a cover and an excuse for them to love each other at arms lengths (because they’re both too scared to make that first move), and put themselves out of that do-they-don’t-they like me misery, then that’s where it becomes an issue.especially when both men (eddie) get jealous of the new romantic interest in his best friend’s (buck) life, and when both men (buck) get jealous of a new friend that their best friend made (eddie) that resorted in misplaced violence (injuring eddie’s ankle).—————after eddie and chris arrive back from texas, eddie realises his feelings for buck and on a random weekend with no work, he finally did something about it

entry.title: Becoming Chimney
entry.summary:
Author: Fizz_gerald

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,988Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: She looked at him, tears filling her eyes “Do you…” Her lips trembled “Do you know who you are?”Maddie looked at him intensely and he couldn’t help but feel sorry for her seeing the pleading look on her face. There was something about her that made him feel like he should be sorry.He cleared his voice before mustering his voice to finally work “Sorry.” He rasped.“No, it’s- it’s okay.” Her voice shook, sadness settling on her face bringing her eyebrows down.Looking at her was about just as painful as his headache, but the pain was different. It rattled his heart in a way he couldn’t understand. He couldn’t understand a lot of things right now.“I’m sorry, who are you?” After episode 7x6 Chimney's amnesia doesn't go away, now Maddie and the whole of 118 must do their best to make sure he find his way back to them. All the while Howard doesn't understand why "Chimney" is the one they want back.

entry.title: If I didn't love you
entry.summary:
Author: penpen_xo

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,588Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 103

Summary: “We are friends Buck.” Eddie cried desperately. “You’re my best friend!”“Christ Eddie, you gave me your son!” He yelled now, the anger rising fast from somewhere he didn’t recognise. “You wrote it, signed it and sealed it with your life, binding us all together. What did you expect me to do with that!? Or was it just a…a break glass in case of an emergency thing? Buck will always be there to pick up the pieces, but only when we need him and when he can be useful.”Eddie scowled, his jaw twitching.“That is not fair.” His eyes were dark, eyebrows furrowed in equal anger to Bucks. “You can’t use that against me.”orEddie leaves for Texas, and Buck follows, only to quickly return a broken man.As they deal with the fallout, Eddie learns to fight for himself and Buck learns to live again in a world where he doesn't get to love Eddie Diaz.But that's not the end of the story...

entry.title: My home is yours
entry.summary:
Author: Millowe

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,048Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 5

Summary: It's simply a story of finding love, maybe where it’s not expected. Two oblivious best friends who slowly work their way through a new normal. But everything in life doesn't always go as planned, does it? Especially for these two.—When he hears a low chuckle from the side he looks over and sees Eddie watching him amusedly.“Comfy?” He teases and Buck just gives him a look before snuggling deeper into his spot, pulling the comforter up to his chin, all hesitation from before gone.“No offense to your couch, but yeah.” He mumbles, already feeling sleep slipping into his body, and he blinks tiredly at Eddie and turns on his side towards him. The man just watches him for a moment, a small smile on his lips

entry.title: The Boy Who Could Fly
entry.summary:
Author: betweensaintsandsinners

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,384Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 13

Summary: Buck got out of his seat and darted inside to the bathroom, his breathing unsteady as he gripped the bathroom sink. His heart was pounding in his chest and all he could see was himself failing over and over again. He could hear himself asking his team to sound off, but without reply. He was at the lab door and after all these months, it was like everyone was able to get out of there but him, still crumpled up in the hallway— a hell he had made home. Stomach burning, he barely made it to the toilet before it emptied itself.There was a gentle knock on the door and Buck rose to his feet quickly, his voice a mask of happiness when he opened it to see Eddie standing there. He had to hold it together. He had to be the happy Buck that they all counted on. Who else would he be? You cannot have survivors guilt for the living..———————————————Bobby Nash lives, but Buck still has to suffer the consequences of being the one who was unable to save the 118.

entry.title: best friends, ex-friends 'til the end (better off as lovers)
entry.summary:
Author: drakesword

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,921Chapters: 2/40Kudos: 3

Summary: A lot of things are gay at this school, Eddie has noticed. It’s not necessarily a new phenomenon, but back in elementary school, that word was only ever hushed, giggled over, never dared to be said in front of the teachers, in fear of being scolded.Here, however, it’s shouted down hallways, said out loud in classrooms, written on blackboards, thrown at the heads of kids who dare to express themselves in the wrong way.So yeah, no thanks. Eddie would rather not approach, or even look at anyone with something remotely close to a social life at this school again. He doesn’t want to make himself a target.Because if there is one thing people should know about him, it’s this: Eddie Diaz is not gay. Or; AU where Buck and Eddie meet in middle school and quickly become best friends. But is that really all they are?

entry.title: Soul Tied
entry.summary:
Author: Bucklleydiaz

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,456Chapters: 3/5Kudos: 425

Summary: After a fight leaves things tense between them, Buck and Eddie head out on what should’ve been a routine call but it goes terribly wrong.In the aftermath of it, Eddie is left to navigate the wreckage: guilt, silence, and the growing sense that something is deeply wrong.The team is distant. The truth is fractured. And somewhere beneath it all, a love neither of them dared name begins to haunt what’s been left behind.OrA love is confessed. A shot is fired. And everything falls apart.

entry.title: Buddie WIP
entry.summary:
Author: Kingbob85

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,121Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 2

Summary: following the events of 8/15 Buck finds himself lost in his own mind until his "straight best friend" Eddie returns and is there to drawn him back out. when Eddie is suddenly drawn out of his own mind and realizes something about himself at the worst possible time.
